channel.title: Bootstrap, by Twitter!
channel.description:
Okay, so you may have seen a lot of high end newfag 718 servers using this template/software, this is because lately me and Apache Ah64 and whoever done the Sevador website have been using this new bootstrap by twitter, so has powerbot by the looks of things.
Bootstrap is an open source HTML resource that can make a very nice sleek and flexible site. If you have any knowledge of PHP it looks brilliant if you link it to the forums of the server or whatever.
You can find bootstrap here - http://twitter.github.com/bootstrap/
If you don't know how to get the template you want you should be shot.
Not exactly a release, but it's a good find.

item.title: Bootstrap, by Twitter!
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

I prefer Bootstrap rather than Skeleton, just a personal preference I suppose.

Read full topic

item.title: Bootstrap, by Twitter!
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

I pissed myself laughing at that, oh my fucking god LOL.

I’ll do a website design tutorial tonight, covering the creation of ones own website. Since all I’ve done so far is PHP, ill refer back to my web designing days.

Read full topic

item.title: Bootstrap, by Twitter!
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

[quote=“Ruby, post:3, topic:452527”][quote author=Team_Rocket link=topic=555406.msg4066206#msg4066206 date=1343916186]

Okay, so you may have seen a lot of high end newfag 718 servers

The tears on my pillow cannot compare to the pain that is in my heart.
[/quote]
The worst thing is I’m actually a website developer for one and I’ve made like 8 others websites. The things we’ll do for money, eh.

Anyways, what would you like the tutorial to cover?[/quote]

It doesn’t matter to me, I won’t be using them. I just like to see your contributions. I’ve done much worse things for money. That night I was known as Mrs. Phillis Levin, I’ll leave out the part about wearing a fishnet and singing show-tunes.

Read full topic
